snippet.title: Hashbang Presents ATOMIC TITANS: Light Violence
snippet.description:
Embark on a cosmic journey with ATOMIC TITANS: Light Violence, an action-packed casual combat game. Engage in heart-pounding showdowns within the confines of space faring arenas.

Across three elimination rounds, you’ll face off against up to 48 other combatants. Players will encounter randomized combinations of maps, weapon sets, and objectives to conquer.

Published by 2 Sodas, this game is poised to redefine how you experience action, competition, and camaraderie in the world of gaming.

Coming soon to PC, Mobile, and Consoles. 

Sign up for our Beta Test Group on our website: https://www.hashbanginc.com/beta-sign-up
